ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:1: Yesu azamurwa mu ijuru, abigishwa basubira i Yerusalemu (Mat 28.19-20; Mar 16.15; Luka 24.51)1.Tewofilo we: Muri cya gitabo cya mbere nanditse ibyo Yesu yabanje gukora no kwigisha byose,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:2: 2.kugeza ku munsi yazamuriwe mu ijuru amaze gutegeka intumwa yatoranije, azitegekesha Umwuka Wera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:3: 3.Amaze kubabazwa ababonekera ari muzima, atanga ibimenyetso byinshi, agumya kubabonekera mu minsi mirongo ine avuga iby’ubwami bw’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:4: 4.Nuko abateraniriza hamwe, abategeka kutava i Yerusalemu ati “Ahubwo murindire ibyo Data yasezeranije, ibyo nababwiye:
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:5: 5.kuko Yohana yabatirishaga amazi, ariko mwebweho mu minsi mike muzabatirishwa Umwuka Wera.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:6: 6.Nuko bamaze guterana baramubaza bati “Mbese Mwami, iki ni cyo gihe wenda kugaruriramo ubwami mu Bisirayeli?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:7: 7.Arabasubiza ati “Si ibyanyu kumenya iby’iminsi cyangwa ibihe Data yagennye, ni ubutware bwe wenyine.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:8: 8.Icyakora muzahabwa imbaraga Umwuka Wera nabamanukira, kandi muzaba abagabo bo kumpamya i Yerusalemu n’i Yudaya yose n’i Samariya, no kugeza ku mpera y’isi.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:9: 9.Amaze kuvuga atyo azamurwa bakimureba, igicu kiramubakingiriza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:10: 10.Bakiraramye batumbira mu ijuru akigenda, abagabo babiri barababonekera bahagaze iruhande rwabo, bambaye imyenda yera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:11: 11.Barababaza bati “Yemwe bagabo b’i Galilaya, ni iki gitumye muhagaze mureba mu ijuru? Yesu ubakuwemo akazamurwa mu ijuru, azaza atyo nk’uko mumubonye ajya mu ijuru.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:12: 12.Basubira i Yerusalemu bavuye ku musozi witwa Elayono, uri bugufi bw’i Yerusalemu nk’urugendo rwo kugendwa ku isabato.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:13: 13.Basohoyeyo barurira bajya mu cyumba cyo hejuru, aho Petero na Yohana na Yakobo, na Andereya na Filipo na Toma, na Barutolomayo na Matayo na Yakobo mwene Alufayo, na Simoni Zelote na Yuda mwene Yakobo babaga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:14: 14.Abo bose hamwe n’abagore na Mariya nyina wa Yesu na bene se, bakomezaga gusengana umutima uhuye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:15: Matiyasi atoranywa gusubira mu mwanya wa Yuda15.Muri iyo minsi Petero ahagaze hagati ya bene Data, (umubare w’abantu bose bari bahateraniye bari nk’ijana na makumyabiri), aravuga ati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:16: 16.“Bagabo bene Data, ibyanditswe byari bikwiriye gusohora, ibyo Umwuka Wera yahanuriye mu kanwa ka Dawidi kuri Yuda wayoboye abafashe Yesu,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:17: 17.kuko yari yarabazwe muri twe, agahabwa umugabane w’uyu murimo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:18: 18.(Kandi uwo muntu, amaze kugura isambu ku byo yahawe ho igihembo cyo gukiranirwa kwe, agwa yubamye araturika, amara ye yose arataraka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:19: 19.Bimenyekana mu batuye i Yerusalemu bose, ni cyo cyatumye iyo sambu mu rurimi rwabo bayita Akeludama, risobanurwa ngo “Isambu y’amaraso.”)
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:20: 20.“Ndetse byanditswe mu gitabo cya Zaburi ngo ‘Iwe hasigare ubusa, Kandi he kugira undi uhaba.’ Kandi ngo ‘Ubusonga bwe bugabane undi.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:21: 21.“Nuko muri abo twagendanaga iteka, ubwo Umwami Yesu yari akiri muri twe,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:22: 22.uhereye ku kubatiza kwa Yohana ukageza ku munsi Yesu yadukuriwemo azamuwe, bikwiriye ko umwe aba umugabo hamwe natwe wo guhamya kuzuka kwe.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:23: 23.Bahitamo babiri, umwe ni Yosefu witwaga Barisaba, uwo bahimbye Yusito, undi ni Matiyasi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:24: 24.Barasenga bati “Mwami Mana, umenya imitima y’abantu bose, werekane uwo utoranije muri aba bombi
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:25: 25.abe intumwa, ahabwe uyu murimo Yuda yataye akajya ahe.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:1:26: 26.Barabafindira, ubufindo bufata Matiyasi. Nuko abaranwa n’intumwa cumi n’imwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:1: Uko Umwuka Wera yamanukiye intumwa1.Umunsi wa Pentekote usohoye, bose bari bari hamwe mu mwanya umwe bahuje umutima.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:2: 2.Nuko umuriri ubatungura uvuye mu ijuru umeze nk’uw’umuyaga uhuha cyane, ukwira inzu bari bicayemo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:3: 3.Haboneka indimi zigabanije zisa n’umuriro, ururimi rujya ku muntu wese wo muri bo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:4: 4.Bose buzuzwa Umwuka Wera, batangira kuvuga izindi ndimi nk’uko Umwuka yabahaye kuzivuga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:5: 5.Muri Yerusalemu habaga Abayuda b’abaturage b’abanyadini, bari baraturutse mu mahanga yose ari munsi y’ijuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:6: 6.Uwo muriri ubaye abantu benshi baraterana, batangazwa n’uko umuntu wese yumvise ba bandi bavuga ururimi rw’iwabo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:7: 7.Barumirwa bose baratangara bati “Mbese aba bose bavuga si Abanyagalilaya?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:8: 8.None se ni iki gitumye twese tubumva bavuga indimi z’iwacu za kavukire?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:9: 9.Kandi turi Abapariti n’Abamedi n’Abanyelamu, n’abatuye i Mezopotamiya n’i Yudaya, n’i Kapadokiya n’i Ponto no muri Asiya,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:10: 10.n’i Furugiya n’i Pamfiliya no muri Egiputa, no mu gihugu cy’i Libiya gihereranye n’i Kurene, n’Abaroma b’abashyitsi n’Abayuda n’abakomeza idini yabo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:11: 11.kandi n’Abakirete n’Abarabu, turabumva bavuga ibitangaza by’Imana mu ndimi z’iwacu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:12: 12.Bose barumirwa, bibayobeye barabazanya bati “Mbese ibi ni ibiki?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:13: 13.Abandi barabanegura bati “Basinze ihira.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:14: Petero abasobanurira ibyabaye abemeza ibya Yesu14.Ariko Petero ahagararana n’abo cumi n’umwe, ababwiza ijwi rirenga ati “Yemwe bagabo b’i Yudaya n’abatuye i Yerusalemu mwese mwe, ibi mubimenye kandi mwumvirize amagambo yanjye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:15: 15.Aba ntibasinze nk’uko mwibwira kuko ubu ari isaha ya gatatu y’umunsi,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:16: 16.ahubwo ibyo mureba ibi byavuzwe n’umuhanuzi Yoweli ngo
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:17: 17.‘Imana iravuze iti: Uku ni ko bizaba mu minsi y’imperuka, Nzasuka ku Mwuka wanjye ku bantu bose, Kandi abahungu n’abakobwa banyu bazahanura, N’abasore banyu bazerekwa, N’abakambwe babarimo bazarota.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:18: 18.Ndetse n’abagaragu banjye n’abaja banjye muri iyo minsi, Nzabasukira ku Mwuka wanjye bazahanura.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:19: 19.Nzashyira amahano mu ijuru hejuru, Nshyire n’ibimenyetso mu isi hasi, Amaraso n’umuriro no gucumba k’umwotsi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:20: 20.Izuba rizahinduka umwijima, N’ukwezi guhinduke amaraso, Uwo munsi mukuru kandi utangaje w’Uwiteka utaraza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:21: 21.Kandi umuntu wese uzambaza izina ry’Uwiteka azakizwa.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:22: 22.“Yemwe bagabo ba Isirayeli mwe, nimwumve aya magambo: Yesu w’i Nazareti, wa muntu Imana yabahamirishije imirimo ikomeye n’ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso, ibyo yamukoresheje hagati yanyu nk’uko mubizi ubwanyu,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:23: 23.uwo muntu amaze gutangwa nk’uko Imana yabigambiriye, ibimenye bitari byaba, mwamubambishije amaboko y’abagome muramwica.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:24: 24.Ariko Imana yaramuzuye ibohoye umubabaro uterwa n’urupfu, kuko bitashobotse ko akomezwa na rwo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:25: 25.Kuko Dawidi yavuze iby’uwo ati ‘Nabonye Umwami ari imbere yanjye iteka ryose, Kuko ari iburyo bwanjye ngo ntanyeganyezwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:26: 26.Ni cyo gituma umutima wanjye unezerwa, Ururimi rwanjye rukishima, Kandi n’umubiri wanjye uzaruhuka wiringiye ibizaba.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:27: 27.Kuko utazarekera ubugingo bwanjye ikuzimu, Cyangwa ngo uhane Uwera wawe abone kubora.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:28: 28.Wamenyesheje inzira y’ubugingo, Uzanyuzuza umunezero kuko ndi imbere yawe.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:29: 29.“Bagabo bene Data, nta kimbuza kubabwira nshize amanga ibya sogokuruza mukuru Dawidi, yuko yapfuye agahambwa ndetse n’igituro cye kiracyari iwacu n’ubu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:30: 30.Nuko rero, kuko yari umuhanuzi akamenya ko Imana yamurahiye indahiro, yuko izamuha umwe mu buzukuruza be ngo abe ari we usubira ku ngoma ye,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:31: 31.yavugaga ibyo kuzuka kwa Kristo abibonye bitari byaba. Ni cyo cyatumye avuga ko atarekewe ikuzimu, kandi ngo n’umubiri we nturakabora.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:32: 32.Imana yazuye Yesu uwo, natwe twese turi abagabo bo guhamya ibyo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:33: 33.Nuko amaze kuzamurwa n’ukuboko kw’iburyo kw’Imana, no guhabwa na Se ibyo yasezeranije ari byo Mwuka Wera, none asutse icyo mureba kandi mwumva.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:34: 34.Kuko atari Dawidi wazamutse mu ijuru, ahubwo ubwe yaravuze ati ‘Uwiteka yabwiye Umwami wanjye ati: Icara iburyo bwanjye,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:35: 35.Ugeze aho nzashyira abanzi bawe munsi y’ibirenge byawe.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:36: 36.“Nuko abo mu muryango wa Isirayeli bose, nibamenye badashidikanya yuko Yesu uwo mwabambye, Imana yamugize Umwami na Kristo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:37: Abantu ibihumbi bitatu bahindukirira Imana37.Abo bantu bumvise ibyo bibacumita mu mitima, nuko babaza Petero n’izindi ntumwa bati “Bagabo bene Data, mbese tugire dute?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:38: 38.Petero arabasubiza ati “Nimwihane, umuntu wese muri mwe abatizwe mu izina rya Yesu Kristo ngo mubone kubabarirwa ibyaha byanyu, kandi namwe muzahabwa iyi mpano y’Umwuka Wera,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:39: 39.kuko isezerano ari iryanyu n’abana banyu n’abari kure bose, abazahamagarwa n’Umwami Imana yacu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:40: 40.Nuko akomeza kubahamiriza n’andi magambo menshi, arabahugura ati “Mwikize ab’iki gihe biyobagiza.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:41: 41.Nuko abemeye amagambo ye barabatizwa, abongewe ku basanzwe kuri uwo munsi baba nk’ibihumbi bitatu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:42: 42.Bahoraga bashishikariye ibyo intumwa zigishaga, bagasangira ibyabo, no kumanyagura umutsima no gusenga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:43: Uko Abakristo ba mbere basangiraga ibyabo43.Abantu bose bagira ubwoba, nuko intumwa zikora ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso byinshi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:44: 44.Abizeye bose babaga hamwe bagasangira ibyabo byose,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:45: 45.ubutunzi bwabo n’ibintu byabo barabiguraga, bakabigabanya bose nk’uko umuntu akennye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:46: 46.Kandi iminsi yose bakomezaga kujya mu rusengero n’umutima uhuye, n’iwabo bakamanyagura umutsima bakarya bishimye, bafite imitima itishama
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:2:47: 47.bahimbaza Imana, bashimwa n’abantu bose, kandi uko bukeye Umwami Imana ikabongerera abakizwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:1: Petero na Yohana bakiriza ikirema ku irembo ry’urusengero1.Nuko Petero na Yohana barazamuka bajya mu rusengero mu gihe cyo gusenga, ari cyo saa cyenda.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:2: 2.Hariho umuntu wavutse aremaye ibirenge, yarahekwaga agashyirwa ku irembo ry’urusengero ryitwa Ryiza, kugira ngo asabirize abinjira mu rusengero.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:3: 3.Abonye Petero na Yohana bagiye kwinjira mu rusengero, arabasaba ngo bamuhe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:4: 4.Petero na Yohana baramutumbira, Petero aramubwira ati “Uturebe.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:5: 5.Abitaho agira ngo hari icyo bamuha.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:6: 6.Petero aramubwira ati “Ifeza n’izahabu nta byo mfite, ahubwo icyo mfite ndakiguha. Mu izina rya Yesu Kristo w’i Nazareti, haguruka ugende.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:7: 7.Maze amufata ukuboko kw’iburyo aramuhagurutsa, uwo mwanya ibirenge bye n’ubugombambari birakomera,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:8: 8.arabandaduka arahagarara, aratambuka yinjirana na bo mu rusengero, atambuka yitera hejuru ashima Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:9: 9.Abantu bose babona agenda ashima Imana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:10: 10.baramumenya ko ari we wajyaga yicara ku irembo ry’urusengero ryitwaga Ryiza asabiriza ngo bamuhe, barumirwa cyane batangazwa n’ibimubayeho.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:11: Petero yigisha abateranijwe no kureba uwakijijwe11.Agifashe Petero na Yohana abantu bose birukankira kuri bo, bateranira ku ibaraza ryitwa irya Salomo bumiwe cyane.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:12: 12.Petero abibonye abaza abo bantu ati “Yemwe bagabo ba Isirayeli, ni iki gitumye mutangarira ibi? Mudutumbirira iki nk’aho ari imbaraga zacu cyangwa kubaha Imana kwacu, biduhaye kumugendesha?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:13: 13.Imana ya Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo, ari yo Mana ya ba sogokuruza, yashimishije Umugaragu wayo Yesu, uwo mwatanze mukamwihakanira imbere ya Pilato, amaze guca urubanza rwo kumurekura.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:14: 14.Ariko mwihakana Uwera kandi Umukiranutsi, musaba ko bababohorera umwicanyi,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:15: 15.nuko wa Mukuru w’ubugingo muramwica, ariko Imana iramuzura. Natwe turi abagabo bo guhamya ibyo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:16: 16.“Kandi uyu, uwo mureba kandi muzi, kuko yizeye izina ry’Uwo ni ryo rimuhaye imbaraga, kandi kwizera ahawe n’Uwo ni ko kumukirije rwose imbere yanyu mwese.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:17: 17.Kandi none bene Data, nzi yuko mwabikoze mutabizi, n’abatware banyu na bo ni uko.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:18: 18.Ariko ibyo Imana yahanuriye mu kanwa k’abahanuzi bose yuko Kristo wayo azababazwa, ibyo yabishohoje ityo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:19: 19.Nuko mwihane muhindukire, ibyaha byanyu bihanagurwe ngo iminsi yo guhemburwa ibone uko iza ituruka ku Mmwami Imana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:20: 20.itume Yesu ari we Kristo wabatoranirijwe kera,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:21: 21.uwo ijuru rikwiriye kwakira kugeza ibihe ibintu byose bizongera gutunganirizwa, nk’uko Imana yavugiye mu kanwa k’abahanuzi bera bayo bose uhereye kera kose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:22: 22.Mose yaravuze ati ‘Umwami Imana izabahagurukiriza umuhanuzi muri bene wanyu umeze nkanjye, nuko muzamwumvire mu byo azababwira byose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:23: 23.Nuko rero, umuntu wese utazumvira uwo muhanuzi azarimburwa mu bantu.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:24: 24.“Kandi n’abahanuzi bose, uhereye kuri Samweli n’abamukurikiyeho, uko bahanuye bose ni na ko bajyaga bavuga iby’iyi minsi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:25: 25.Namwe muri abana b’abahanuzi, kandi muri ab’isezerano Imana yasezeranye na ba sekuruza wanyu, ibwira Aburahamu iti ‘Mu rubyaro rwawe ni mo imiryango yose yo mu isi izaherwa umugisha.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:3:26: 26.Ni mwebwe Imana yabanje gutumaho Umugaragu wayo imaze kumuzura, kugira ngo abahe umugisha abahindure, umuntu wese ngo ave mu byaha bye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:1: Abatambyi bafata Petero na Yohana1.Bakivugana n’abantu, abatambyi bazana aho bari n’umutware w’urusengero n’Abasadukayo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:2: 2.bababajwe cyane n’uko bigisha abantu, bababwira yuko kuzuka kw’abapfuye kwabonetse kuri Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:3: 3.Barabafata maze kuko bwari bugorobye, babashyira mu nzu y’imbohe kugeza mu gitondo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:4: 4.Ariko benshi mu bumvise iryo jambo ry’Imana barizera, umubare w’abagabo uragwira uba nk’ibihumbi bitanu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:5: 5.Bukeye bwaho, abatware n’abakuru n’abanditsi bateranira i Yerusalemu,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:6: 6.na Ana umutambyi mukuru na Kayafa, na Yohana na Alekizanderi n’ab’umuryango bose w’abatambyi bakuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:7: 7.Babata hagati barababaza bati “Ni mbaraga ki, cyangwa ni zina ki byabateye gukora ibyo?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:8: 8.Nuko Petero yuzuye Umwuka Wera arababwira ati “Batware b’abantu namwe bakuru,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:9: 9.uyu munsi turabazwa ibyo twagiriye neza umuntu wari uremaye, kandi turabazwa icyamukijije.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:10: 10.Ariko mumenye mwese n’abantu bose bo mu Bisirayeli, yuko ari izina rya Yesu Kristo w’i Nazareti, uwo mwabambye Imana ikamuzura, ari ryo ritumye uyu muntu ahagarara imbere yanyu ari muzima.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:11: 11.Yesu ni we buye ryahinyuwe namwe abubatsi, kandi ryahindutse irikomeza imfuruka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:12: 12.Kandi nta wundi agakiza kabonerwamo, kuko ari nta rindi zina munsi y’ijuru ryahawe abantu, dukwiriye gukirizwamo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:13: Babura uko babahana babarekura13.Babonye ubushizi bw’amanga bwa Petero na Yohana, kandi bamenye ko ari abaswa batigishijwe baratangara, maze bibuka ko babanaga na Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:14: 14.Kandi babonye uwo muntu wakijijwe ahagararanye na bo, babura icyo babasubiza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:15: 15.Babategeka kuva mu rukiko maze bajya inama bati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:16: 16.“Aba bantu tubagire dute ko bimenyekanye mu batuye i Yerusalemu bose yuko bakoze ikimenyetso cyogeye, natwe tutubasha kubihakana?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:17: 17.Ariko kugira ngo bitarushaho kwamamara mu bantu, tubakangishe batongera kugira umuntu wese babwira muri iryo zina.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:18: 18.Bongera kubahamagara, barabategeka ngo bareke rwose kuvuga cyangwa kwigisha mu izina rya Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:19: 19.Petero na Yohana barabasubiza bati “Niba ari byiza imbere y’Imana kubumvira kuruta Imana nimuhitemo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:20: 20.kuko tutabasha kwiyumanganya ngo tureke kuvuga ibyo twabonye kandi twumvise.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:21: 21.Na bo bongeye kubakangisha barabarekura, babuze uko babahana batinya abantu, kuko bose bahimbarizaga Imana ibyabaye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:22: 22.Kuko uwo muntu wakorewe icyo kimenyetso cyo kumukiza yari ashagije imyaka mirongo ine avutse.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:23: Ab’Itorero babyumvise basaba Imana kubaha gushira amanga23.Nuko barekuwe basubira muri bagenzi babo, babatekerereza ibyo babwiwe byose n’abatambyi bakuru n’abakuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:24: 24.Na bo babyumvise bavuga ijwi rirenga n’umutima uhuye, babwira Imana bati “Databuja, ni wowe waremye ijuru n’isi n’inyanja n’ibirimo byose,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:25: 25.kandi wavugiye mu kanwa ka sogokuruza Dawidi umugaragu wawe, ubivugisha Umwuka Wera ngo ‘Ni iki gitumye abanyamahanga bagira imidugararo, N’abantu bagatekereza iby’ubusa?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:26: 26.Abami bo mu isi bateje urugamba, N’abakuru bateraniye hamwe, Kurwanya Uwiteka n’Uwo yasize.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:27: 27.Kandi koko Herode na Pontiyo Pilato, hamwe n’abanyamahanga n’imiryango y’Abisirayeli bateraniye muri uyu murwa kurwanya Umugaragu wawe wera Yesu, uwo wasize,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:28: 28.ngo basohoze ibyo ukuboko kwawe n’ubwenge bwawe byategetse mbere, byose bitari byaba.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:29: 29.Kandi none Mwami Mana, reba ibikangisho byabo, uhe abagaragu bawe kuvuga ijambo ryawe bashize amanga rwose,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:30: 30.ukiramburira ukuboko kwawe kugira ngo gukize, gukore n’ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza mu izina ry’Umugaragu wawe wera Yesu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:31: 31.Bamaze gusenga, aho bari bateraniye haba umushyitsi, bose buzuzwa Umwuka Wera, bavuga ijambo ry’Imana bashize amanga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:32: Uko Abakristo ba mbere basangiraga ibyabo32.Abizeye bose bahuzaga umutima n’inama, kandi nta n’umwe wagiraga ubwiko ku kintu, ahubwo byose barabisangiraga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:33: 33.Kandi intumwa zagiraga imbaraga nyinshi zo guhamya kuzuka k’Umwami Yesu, nuko rero ubuntu bw’Imana bwinshi bukaba kuri bo bose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:34: 34.Nta mukene wababagamo, kuko abari bafite amasambu bose cyangwa amazu babiguraga, bakazana ibiguzi by’ibyo baguze
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:35: 35.bakabishyira intumwa, na zo zikabigabanya abantu, umuntu wese agahabwa icyo akennye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:36: 36.Na Yosefu Umulewi wavukiye i Kupuro, uwo intumwa zahimbye Barinaba, risobanurwa ngo “Umwana wo guhugura”,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:4:37: 37.yari afite isambu arayigura, azana ibiguzi byayo abishyira intumwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:1: Ibya Ananiya na Safira1.Hariho umugabo witwaga Ananiya hamwe n’umugore we Safira, agura isambu
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:2: 2.agabanya ku biguzi byayo umugore na we abizi, maze azana igice agishyira intumwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:3: 3.Petero aramubaza ati “Ananiya, ni iki gitumye Satani yuzuza umutima wawe kubeshya Umwuka Wera, ukisigariza igice cy’ibiguzi by’isambu?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:4: 4.Ukiyifite ntiyari iyawe? Kandi umaze kuyigura, ibiguzi byayo ntibyari ibyawe ubyigengaho? Ni iki gitumye wigira inama yo gukora utyo? Si abantu ubeshye, ahubwo Imana ni yo ubeshye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:5: 5.Ananiya abyumvise atyo aragwa umwuka urahera, ababyumvise bose bagira ubwoba bwinshi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:6: 6.Nuko abasore barahaguruka baramukubira, baramujyana baramuhamba.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:7: 7.Hahise nk’amasaha atatu, umugore we arinjira atazi uko byagenze,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:8: 8.Petero aramubaza ati “Mbwira, mbese ibi biguzi ni byo mwaguze isambu?” Aramusubiza ati “Yee, ni byo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:9: 9.Petero aramubaza ati “Ni iki gitumye muhuza inama yo kugerageza Umwuka w’Umwami Imana? Dore ibirenge by’abamaze guhamba umugabo wawe bigeze ku muryango, nawe barakujyana.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:10: 10.Muri ako kanya amugwa ku birenge umwuka urahera. Ba basore binjiye basanga amaze gupfa, baramujyana bamuhamba hamwe n’umugabo we.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:11: 11.Itorero ryose n’ababyumvise bose bagira ubwoba bwinshi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:12: Intumwa zikora ibitangaza byinshi12.Ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza byinshi byakorwaga mu bantu n’amaboko y’intumwa, kandi bose bateraniraga mu ibaraza rya Salomo n’umutima uhuye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:13: 13.Ariko nubwo abantu bose babahimbazaga cyane, ntihagiraga n’umwe muri bo watinyukaga kwifatanya na bo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:14: 14.Nyamara abizeye Umwami Yesu bakomezaga kubongerwaho, abantu benshi b’abagabo n’abagore,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:15: 15.byatumaga bazana abarwayi mu nzira bakabashyira ku mariri no mu ngobyi, kugira ngo Petero nahanyura nibura igicucu cye kigere kuri bamwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:16: 16.Hateraniraga benshi bavuye no mu midugudu ihereranye n’i Yerusalemu, bazanye abababazwa n’abadayimoni bose bagakizwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:17: Intumwa zishyirwa mu nzu y’imbohe, marayika azikuramo17.Ibyo ni byo byatumye umutambyi mukuru ahagurukana n’abari kumwe na we bose, ari bo gice kitwa icy’Abasadukayo, buzura ishyari
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:18: 18.bafata intumwa bazishyira mu nzu y’imbohe zose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:19: 19.Maze nijoro marayika w’Umwami Imana akingura inzugi z’inzu y’imbohe, arabasohora arababwira ati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:20: 20.“Nimugende muhagarare mu rusengero, mubwire abantu amagambo yose y’ubu bugingo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:21: 21.Babyumvise batyo, binjira mu rusengero mu museke barigisha. Bakiriyo umutambyi mukuru ajyana n’abari bafatanije na we, bahamagara abanyarukiko n’abakuru bose b’Abisirayeli, maze batuma mu nzu y’imbohe kuzana intumwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:22: 22.Ariko bagiye ntibazisanga mu nzu y’imbohe. Nuko baragaruka barababwira bati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:23: 23.“Inzu y’imbohe dusanze ikinze neza, n’abarinzi bahagaze inyuma y’inzugi, maze dukinguye ntitwagira umuntu dusangamo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:24: 24.Umutware w’urusengero n’abatambyi bakuru bumvise ayo magambo, bayoberwa iby’intumwa ibyo ari byo, bibaza uko bizamera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:25: Bongera gufata intumwa, bazihana25.Ariko haza umuntu arababwira ati “Dore ba bantu mwashyize mu nzu y’imbohe bahagaze mu rusengero barigisha abantu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:26: 26.Maze uwo mutware n’abasirikare baragenda babazana ku neza, kuko batinyaga rubanda ngo batabatera amabuye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:27: 27.Bamaze kubashyira imbere y’abanyarukiko,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:28: 28.umutambyi mukuru arababaza ati “Ntitwabihanangirije cyane kutigisha muri rya zina? None dore mwujuje i Yerusalemu ibyo mwigisha, murashaka kudushyiraho amaraso ya wa muntu!”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:29: 29.Petero n’izindi ntumwa barabasubiza bati “Ibikwiriye ni ukumvira Imana kuruta abantu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:30: 30.Imana ya sogokuruza yazuye Yesu, uwo mwishe mumubambye ku giti.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:31: 31.Imana yaramuzamuye imushyira iburyo bwayo ngo abe Ukomeye n’Umukiza, aheshe Abisirayeli kwihana no kubabarirwa ibyaha.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:32: 32.Natwe turi abagabo bo guhamya ibyo hamwe n’Umwuka Wera, uwo Imana yahaye abayumvira.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:33: 33.Babyumvise bazabiranywa n’uburakari, bashaka kubica.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:34: 34.Ariko mu rukiko Umufarisayo witwaga Gamaliyeli, wari umwigishamategeko wubahwa n’abantu bose, arahaguruka ategeka ko baheza intumwa akanya gato.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:35: 35.Maze arababwira ati “Yemwe bagabo b’Abisirayeli, nimwitonde mumenye uko mugirira aba bantu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:36: 36.Muzi ko mu minsi yashize Teyuda yahagurutse avuga yuko ari umuntu ukomeye, nuko abantu nka magana ane baramukurikira. Bukeye aricwa, abamwumviraga bose baratatana bahinduka ubusa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:37: 37.Hanyuma ye mu minsi yo kwandikwa haduka Umunyagalilaya witwaga Yuda, agomesha abantu benshi baramukurikira, na we aricwa n’abamwumviraga bose baratatana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:38: 38.Kandi none ndababwira nti ‘Muzibukire aba bantu mubarekure, kuko iyi nama n’ibyo bakora, nibiba bivuye ku bantu bizatsindwa,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:39: 39.ariko nibiba bivuye ku Mana ntimuzabasha kubatsinda. Mwirinde mutazaboneka ko murwanya Imana.’ ”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:40: 40.Baramwumvira, nuko bahamagara intumwa barazikubita, bazibuza kwigisha mu izina rya Yesu maze barazirekura.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:41: 41.Ziva imbere y’abanyarukiko zinejejwe n’uko zemerewe gukorwa n’isoni bazihora iryo zina.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:5:42: 42.Nuko ntizasiba kwigisha no kuvuga ubutumwa bwiza bwa Yesu Kristo iminsi yose mu rusengero n’iwabo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:1: Abadiyakoni ba mbere1.Nuko muri icyo gihe abigishwa bakigwira, Abayuda ba kigiriki batangira kwitotombera Abaheburayo, kuko abapfakazi babo bacikanwaga ku igerero ry’iminsi yose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:2: 2.Abo cumi na babiri bahamagara abigishwa bose bati “Ntibikwiriye ko turekera kwigisha ijambo ry’Imana kwicara ku meza tugabura.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:3: 3.Nuko bene Data, mutoranye muri mwe abantu barindwi bashimwa, buzuye Umwuka Wera n’ubwenge, tubashyire kuri uwo murimo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:4: 4.Ariko twebweho tuzakomeza gusenga no kugabura ijambo ry’Imana.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:5: 5.Abahateraniye bose bashima ayo magambo, batoranya Sitefano umuntu wuzuye kwizera n’Umwuka Wera, na Filipo na Purokoro na Nikanori na Timoni, na Parumena na Nikolawo wo muri Antiyokiya watoye idini y’Abayuda,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:6: 6.babashyira imbere y’intumwa kandi bamaze gusenga babarambikaho ibiganza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:7: 7.Nuko ijambo ry’Imana rikomeza kwamamara, umubare w’abigishwa ugwira cyane i Yerusalemu, abatambyi benshi bumvira uko kwizera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:8: Abayuda bafata Sitefano bamurega ibinyoma8.Sitefano wari wuzuye ubuntu bw’Imana n’imbaraga, yakoraga mu bantu ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso bikomeye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:9: 9.Ariko abantu bamwe bo mu isinagogi yitwa iy’Abaliberutino n’iy’Abanyakurene n’iy’Abanyalekizanderiya n’iy’Abanyakilikiya n’iy’Abanyasiya, barahaguruka bajya impaka na Sitefano,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:10: 10.nyamara ntibabasha gutsinda ubwenge n’Umwuka bimuvugisha.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:11: 11.Nuko bagurira abagabo bo kuvuga bati “Twumvise avuga amagambo yo gutuka Mose n’Imana.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:12: 12.Boshya abantu n’abakuru n’abanditsi baramusumira, baramufata bamushyira abanyarukiko.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:13: 13.Nuko bahagurutsa abagabo b’ibinyoma baravuga bati “Uyu muntu ntabwo asiba gutuka Ahera n’amategeko,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:14: 14.kuko twumvise avuga ati ‘Yesu w’i Nazareti azasenya aha hantu, kandi azahindura imigenzo twahawe na Mose.’ ”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:6:15: 15.Abicaye mu rukiko bose bamutumbiriye, babona mu maso ha Sitefano hasa n’aha marayika.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:1: Sitefano yiregura1.Umutambyi mukuru aramubaza ati “Ibyo ni ko biri?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:2: 2.Aramusubiza ati “Yemwe bene Data kandi ba data, nimwumve. Imana y’icyubahiro yabonekeye sogokuruza Aburahamu ari i Mesopotamiya ataratura i Harani,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:3: 3.iramubwira iti ‘Va mu gihugu cyanyu no muri bene wanyu ujye mu gihugu nzakwereka.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:4: 4.Maze ava mu gihugu cy’Abakaludaya, atura i Harani. Se amaze gupfa Imana iramwimura imuzana muri iki gihugu, ari cyo mugituyemo na bugingo n’ubu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:5: 5.Ariko ntiyamuhayeho ikibanza naho haba aho gukandagiza ikirenge, ahubwo yamusezeraniye kuzakimuha ngo abe nyiracyo n’urubyaro rwe, kandi yari ataragira umwana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:6: 6.Maze Imana iravuga iti ‘Urubyaro rwawe ruzaba abasuhuke mu gihugu cy’abandi, bazabahindura abaretwa, babagirire nabi imyaka magana ane.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:7: 7.Kandi ishyanga bazakorera uburetwa ni jye uzaricira ho iteka’, ni ko Imana yavuze, kandi iti ‘Hanyuma bazavayo bansengere aha hantu.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:8: 8.Maze imuha isezerano ryo gukebwa. Bukeye abyara Isaka, amukeba ku munsi wa munani. Isaka na we abyara Yakobo, Yakobo abyara ba sogokuruza bakuru cumi na babiri.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:9: 9.“Ba sogokuruza bagirira Yosefu ishyari, baramugura ajyanwa muri Egiputa, ariko Imana ibana na we
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:10: 10.imukiza mu makuba ye yose, imuha gutona n’ubwenge imbere ya Farawo umwami wa Egiputa, maze amugira umutware wa Egiputa n’uw’urugo rwe rwose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:11: 11.Bukeye inzara itera muri Egiputa hose n’i Kanani, haba umubabaro mwinshi, nuko ba sogokuruza babura ibyokurya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:12: 12.Ariko Yakobo yumvise yuko muri Egiputa hari amasaka, atuma ba sogokuruza ubwa mbere.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:13: 13.Maze ubwa kabiri Yosefu amenywa na bene se, nuko umuryango wa Yosefu umenywa na Farawo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:14: 14.Yosefu atumira se Yakobo na bene wabo bose, bari mirongo irindwi na batanu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:15: 15.Yakobo aramanuka ajya muri Egiputa, arapfa we na ba sogokuruza
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:16: 16.babajyana i Shekemu, babahamba mu buvumo Aburahamu yaguze igiciro cy’ifeza na bene Hamori w’i Shekemu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:17: 17.“Ariko igihe cy’isezerano cyenda gusohora, iryo Imana yarahiye Aburahamu, abantu baragwira baba benshi muri Egiputa,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:18: 18.kugeza aho undi mwami yimiye muri Egiputa utazi Yosefu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:19: 19.Uwo mwami agira uburiganya bwo kurimbura ubwoko bwacu, agirira ba sogokuruza nabi, abateshereza abana babo b’impinja kugira ngo batabaho.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:20: 20.Muri icyo gihe Mose aravuka, yari mwiza cyane imbere y’Imana. Bamurerera mu rugo rwa se amezi atatu,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:21: 21.hanyuma amaze gutabwa umukobwa wa Farawo aramujyana, amurera nk’umwana we.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:22: 22.Mose yigishwa ubwenge bwose bw’Abanyegiputa, agira imbaraga mu magambo ye no mu byo akora.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:23: 23.“Ariko amaze imyaka mirongo ine avutse, yigira inama mu mutima we kugenderera bene wabo, ari bo bana ba Isirayeli.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:24: 24.Abonye umuntu urengana aramutabara, ahorera urengana akubita Umunyegiputa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:25: 25.Yibwiraga yuko bene wabo bamenya ko Imana ibakirisha ukuboko kwe, ariko ntibabimenya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:26: 26.Bukeye bw’aho asanga abarwana, agerageza kubakiranura ati ‘Yemwe bagabo, ko muri abavandimwe ni iki gitumye mugirirana nabi?’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:27: 27.Ariko uwarenganyaga mugenzi we aramusunika, aramubaza ati ‘Ni nde wakugize umutware cyangwa umucamanza wacu?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:28: 28.Mbese urashaka kunyica nk’uko ejo wishe wa Munyegiputa?’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:29: 29.Mose abyumvise atyo aracika, aba umusuhuke mu gihugu cy’i Midiyani abyarirayo abahungu babiri.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:30: 30.“Imyaka mirongo ine ishize, marayika amubonekerera mu birimi by’umuriro waka mu gihuru, mu butayu bwo ku musozi wa Sinayi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:31: 31.Mose abibonye biramutangaza, akibyegera ngo abyitegereze yumva ijwi ry’Umwami Imana riti
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:32: 32.‘Ni jye Mana ya ba sekuruza bawe, n’Imana ya Aburahamu na Isaka na Yakobo.’ Mose ahinda umushyitsi ntiyatinyuka kwitegereza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:33: 33.Uwiteka aramubira ati ‘Kwetura inkweto mu birenge byawe, kuko aho uhagaze aho ari ahera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:34: 34.Ni ukuri mbonye umubabaro w’ubwoko bwanjye buri muri Egiputa kandi numvise baniha, namanuwe no kubakiza none ngwino ngutume muri Egiputa.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:35: 35.“Uwo ni we Mose wa wundi banze bati ‘Ni nde wakugize umutware cyangwa umucamanza?’ Ni we Imana yatumye kuba umutware n’umucunguzi, abihawe n’ukuboko kwa marayika uwo wamubonekereye mu gihuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:36: 36.Kandi ni na we wabakuye muri Egiputa, amaze gukorera ibitangaza n’ibimenyetso muri icyo gihugu no mu Nyanja Itukura, no mu butayu mu myaka mirongo ine.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:37: 37.“Mose uwo ni we wabwiye Abisirayeli ati ‘Imana izabahagurukiriza umuhanuzi uvuye muri bene wanyu, umeze nkanjye.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:38: 38.Kandi Mose ni we wari mu itorero ryo mu butayu, hamwe na marayika wavuganiye na we ku musozi wa Sinayi, kandi yari kumwe na ba sogokuruza, ni na we wahawe amagambo y’ubugingo yo kuduha.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:39: 39.“Ba sogokuruza banze kumwumvira, ahubwo bamusunikira hirya basubira muri Egiputa mu mitima yabo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:40: 40.babwira Aroni bati ‘Uturemere imana zo kutujya imbere, kuko Mose uwo wadushoreraga adukura mu gihugu cya Egiputa tutazi uko yabaye.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:41: 41.Nuko biremera ikimasa muri iyo minsi, icyo gishushanyo bagitambira ibitambo, bishimira imirimo y’intoki zabo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:42: 42.Nuko Imana irahindukira irabazibukira, ibarekera gusenga ingabo zo mu ijuru nk’uko byanditswe mu gitabo cy’abahanuzi ngo ‘Yemwe muryango w’Abisirayeli, Mbese mwantambiriye amatungo abazwe cyangwa ibitambo, Imyaka mirongo ine mu butayu?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:43: 43.Mwateruye ihema rya Moleki, N’inyenyeri y’ikigirwamana Refani, Ari ibishushanyo mwaremeye kubisenga. Nanjye nzabimurira hakurya y’i Babuloni.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:44: 44.“Ba sogokuruza bari bafite ihema ry’ubuhamya bari mu butayu, nk’uko Iyavuganye na Mose yamutegetse kurirema, arishushanije n’icyitegererezo cy’iryo yabonye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:45: 45.Iryo ba sogokuruza barihawe na ba se riba uruhererekane, barizana Yosuwa abagiye imbere ubwo batsindaga amahanga, ayo Imana yirukanaga imbere yabo kugeza mu gihe cya Dawidi
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:46: 46.wari utonnye imbere y’Imana, asaba kubakira Imana ya Yakobo ubuturo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:47: 47.Ariko Salomo ni we wayubakiye inzu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:48: 48.“Nyamara Isumbabyose ntiba mu mazu yubatswe n’amaboko, nk’uko wa muhanuzi yavuze ati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:49: 49.‘Ijuru ni ryo ntebe yanjye, Isi ni yo ntebe y’ibirenge byanjye. Muzanyubakira nzu ki? Ni ko Uwiteka ababaza. Cyangwa nzaruhukira hantu ki?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:50: 50.Mbese intoki zanjye si zo zaremye ibyo byose?’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:51: 51.“Yemwe abatagonda ijosi, mwe abatakebwe mu mitima no mu matwi, iteka murwanya Umwuka Wera! Uko ba sekuruza wanyu bakoraga ni ko namwe mukora.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:52: 52.Ni nde mu bahanuzi ba sekuruza wanyu batarenganije? Bishe abavuze ibyo kuza kwa wa Mukiranutsi bitari byaba, none namwe mwaramugambaniye muramwica,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:53: 53.kandi ari mwe mwahawe amategeko n’abamarayika ntimwayitondera.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:54: Bicisha Sitefano amabuye54.Ngo babyumve batyo bazabiranywa n’uburakari, bamuhekenyera amenyo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:55: 55.Ariko Sitefano yuzuye Umwuka Wera arararama, atumbira mu ijuru abona ubwiza bw’Imana na Yesu ahagaze iburyo bw’Imana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:56: 56.aravuga ati “Dore mbonye ijuru rikingutse, n’Umwana w’umuntu ahagaze iburyo bw’Imana.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:57: 57.Barasakuza cyane biziba amatwi, bamugwirira icyarimwe,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:58: 58.baramukurubana bamuvana mu murwa, bamwicisha amabuye. Abagabo bamushinje bashyira imyenda yabo ku birenge by’umusore witwaga Sawuli.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:59: 59.Bakimutera amabuye, arambaza aravuga ati “Mwami Yesu, akira umwuka wanjye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:7:60: 60.Arapfukama avuga ijwi rirenga ati “Mwami, ntubabareho iki cyaha.” Amaze kuvuga atyo arasinzira. Nuko Sawuli na we ashima ko yicwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:1: Abakristo bararenganywa, baratatana1.Uhereye uwo munsi haduka akarengane gakomeye mu Itorero ry’i Yerusalemu, bose batatanira mu bihugu by’i Yudaya n’i Samariya, keretse intumwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:2: 2.Abantu bubahaga Imana bahamba Sitefano, baramuborogera cyane.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:3: 3.Ariko Sawuli we akomeza guca igikuba mu Itorero no kuryonona cyane, akinjira mu mazu yose agafata abagabo n’abagore, akabakurubana mu nzu y’imbohe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:4: Filipo ajya i Samariya4.Nuko abatatanye bajya hose, bamamaza ijambo ry’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:5: 5.Filipo aramanuka ajya mu mudugudu w’i Samariya, ababwiriza ibya Kristo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:6: 6.Ab’aho benshi baraterana, bumva ibyo Filipo avuga n’umutima uhuye bamwitayeho, bumvise kandi babonye ibimenyetso yakoraga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:7: 7.Kuko benshi muri bo bari bafite abadayimoni babavamo basakuza cyane, n’abari baremaye n’abacumbagira benshi barakizwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:8: 8.Haba umunezero mwinshi muri uwo mudugudu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:9: Ibya Simoni umukonikoni9.Hariho umuntu w’umukonikoni witwaga Simoni wabaga muri uwo mudugudu, agatangaza ubwoko bw’Abasamariya akiyita ukomeye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:10: 10.Baramwumvaga bamwitayeho bose, abakomeye n’aboroheje bati “Uyu muntu ni we Mbaraga y’Imana yitwa ikomeye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:11: 11.Icyatumaga bamwitaho, ni uko uhereye kera yajyaga abatangarisha iby’ubukonikoni bwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:12: 12.Ariko bamaze kwizera ubutumwa bwiza Filipo ababwira bw’ubwami bw’Imana n’ubw’izina rya Yesu Kristo, barabatizwa, abagabo n’abagore.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:13: 13.Na Simoni ubwe aremera, kandi amaze kubatizwa agumya kubana na Filipo. Abonye uburyo akora ibimenyetso n’imirimo ikomeye arumirwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:14: 14.Nuko intumwa zari i Yerusalemu zumvise yuko Abasamariya bemeye ijambo ry’Imana, zibatumaho Petero na Yohana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:15: 15.na bo basohoyeyo barabasabira ngo bahabwe Umwuka Wera,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:16: 16.kuko hari hataragira n’umwe wo muri bo amanukira, ahubwo bari barabatijwe gusa mu izina ry’Umwami Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:17: 17.Nuko babarambikaho ibiganza, bahabwa Umwuka Wera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:18: 18.Ariko Simoni abonye yuko abarambitsweho ibiganza by’intumwa bahabwa Umwuka Wera, azizanira ifeza
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:19: 19.arazibwira ati “Nanjye nimumpe ubwo bubasha ngo uwo nzarambikaho ibiganza ahabwe Umwuka Wera.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:20: 20.Petero aramubwira ati “Pfana ifeza yawe, kuko wagize ngo impano y’Imana iboneshwa ifeza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:21: 21.Nta mugabane haba n’urutabe ufite muri byo, kuko umutima wawe udatunganiye Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:22: 22.Nuko wihane ubwo bubi bwawe, usabe Umwami kugira ngo ahari niba bishoboka, ibyo wibwira mu mutima wawe ubibabarirwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:23: 23.Ndakureba uri mu birura no mu ngoyi zo gukiranirwa.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:24: 24.Simoni aramusubiza ati “Munsabire Umwami, kugira ngo hatagira ikintu kimbaho mu byo muvuze.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:25: 25.Na bo bamaze guhamya no kubwira abantu ijambo ry’Umwami, basubira i Yerusalemu babwiriza ubutumwa bwiza mu birorero byinshi by’Abasamariya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:26: Umunyetiyopiya w’inkone yizera Yesu26.Bukeye marayika w’Umwami Imana abwira Filipo ati “Haguruka ugane ikusi, ugere mu nzira imanuka iva i Yerusalemu ikajya i Gaza, ya yindi ica mu butayu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:27: 27.Arahaguruka aragenda. Nuko haza Umunyetiyopiya w’inkone, umutware n’umunyabyuma w’ibintu byose bya Kandake, umugabekazi w’Abanyetiyopiya. Yari yaragiye i Yerusalemu gusenga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:28: 28.Yasubiragayo yicaye mu igare rye, asoma igitabo cy’umuhanuzi Yesaya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:29: 29.Umwuka abwira Filipo ati “Sanga ririya gare ujyane na ryo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:30: 30.Filipo arirukanka yumva asoma igitabo cy’umuhanuzi Yesaya, aramubaza ati “Ibyo usoma ibyo urabyumva?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:31: 31.Undi ati “Nabibasha nte ntabonye ubinsobanurira?” Yinginga Filipo ngo yurire bicarane.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:32: 32.Ibyo yasomaga mu byanditswe byari ibi ngo “Yajyanywe nk’intama bajyana mu ibagiro, Kandi nk’uko umwana w’intama ucecekera imbere y’uwukemura ubwoya, Ni ko atabumbuye akanwa ke.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:33: 33.Ubwo yacishwaga bugufi, Urubanza rwari rumukwiriye barumukuyeho. Umuryango we uzamenyekana ute? Ko ubugingo bwe bukuwe mu isi?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:34: 34.Iyo nkone ibaza Filipo iti “Ndakwinginga mbwira, ayo magambo umuhanuzi yayavuze kuri nde? Yayivuzeho cyangwa yayavuze ku wundi?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:35: 35.Filipo aterura amagambo, ahera kuri ibyo byanditswe amubwira ubutumwa bwiza bwa Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:36: 36.Bakigenda mu nzira bagera ku mazi, iyo nkone iramubaza iti “Dore amazi, ikimbuza kubatizwa ni iki?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:37: 37.Filipo arayisubiza ati “Niba wizeye mu mutima wawe wose birashoboka.” Na yo iti “Nizeye Yesu Kristo ko ari Umwana w’Imana.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:38: 38.Itegeka ko bahagarika igare, baramanukana bajya mu mazi bombi Filipo n’inkone, arayibatiza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:39: 39.Bavuye mu mazi Umwuka w’Imana ajyana Filipo inkone ntiyasubira kumubona, nuko ikomeza kugenda inezerewe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:8:40: 40.Ariko Filipo abonekera muri Azoto, agenda abwira abantu ubutumwa bwiza mu midugudu yose, kugeza aho yagereye i Kayisariya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:1: Yesu abonekera Sawuli mu nzira ijya i Damasiko (Ibyak 22.1-16; 26.9-19)1.Ariko Sawuli akomeza gukangisha abigishwa b’Umwami ko bicwa, ajya ku mutambyi mukuru
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:2: 2.amusaba inzandiko zo guha ab’amasinagogi y’i Damasiko, kugira ngo nabona abantu b’Inzira ya Yesu, abagabo cyangwa abagore, ababohe abajyane i Yerusalemu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:3: 3.Akigenda yenda gusohora i Damasiko, umucyo uramutungura uvuye mu ijuru uramugota.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:4: 4.Agwa hasi yumva ijwi rimubaza riti “Sawuli, Sawuli, undenganiriza iki?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:5: 5.Aramubaza ati “Uri nde, Mwami?” Na we ati “Ndi Yesu, uwo urenganya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:6: 6.Ariko haguruka ujye mu mudugudu, uzabwirwa ibyo ukwiriye gukora.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:7: 7.Abagabo bajyanye na we bahagarara badakoma, kuko bumvise iryo jwi batagize umuntu babona.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:8: 8.Sawuli arabyuka arambuye amaso ntiyagira icyo areba, baramurandata bamujyana i Damasiko.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:9: 9.Amarayo gatatu atareba, atarya kandi atanywa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:10: Ananiya abatiza Sawuli10.I Damasiko hari umwigishwa witwaga Ananiya. Umwami Yesu aramubonekera aramuhamagara ati “Ananiya.” Na we ati “Karame, Mwami.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:11: 11.Umwami aramubwira ati “Haguruka ujye mu nzira yitwa Igororotse, ushakire mu nzu ya Yuda umuntu witwa Sawuli w’i Taruso, kuko ubu ngubu asenga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:12: 12.Kandi na we abonye mu iyerekwa umuntu witwa Ananiya yinjira, amurambikaho ibiganza kugira ngo ahumuke.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:13: 13.Ananiya aramusubiza ati “Mwami, uwo muntu numvise benshi bamuvuga, uko yagiriraga nabi abera bawe bari i Yerusalemu,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:14: 14.kandi n’ino afite ubutware abuhawe n’abatambyi bakuru, bwo kuboha abambaza izina ryawe.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:15: 15.Umwami aramusubiza ati “Genda kuko uwo muntu ari igikoreshwa nitoranirije, ngo yogeze izina ryanjye imbere y’abanyamahanga n’abami n’Abisirayeli,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:16: 16.nanjye nzamwereka ibyo azababazwa na we uburyo ari byinshi, bamuhora izina ryanjye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:17: 17.Ananiya aragenda yinjira mu nzu, amurambikaho ibiganza aramubwira ati “Sawuli mwene Data, Umwami Yesu wakubonekereye mu nzira waturutsemo, arantumye ngo uhumuke wuzuzwe Umwuka Wera.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:18: 18.Uwo mwanya ibisa n’imboneranyi bimuva ku maso arahumuka, arahaguruka arabatizwa,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:19: 19.amaze gufungura abona intege. Amarana iminsi n’abigishwa b’i Damasiko,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:20: 20.aherako abwiriza mu masinagogi yuko Yesu ari Umwana w’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:21: 21.Abamwumvise bose barumirwa bati “Uyu si we warimburiraga i Yerusalemu abambaza iryo zina? Kandi icyamuzanye n’ino si ukugira ngo ababohe, abashyire abatambyi bakuru?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:22: 22.Ariko Sawuli arushaho kugwiza imbaraga, atsinda Abayuda batuye i Damasiko arabamwaza, abahamiriza yuko Yesu ari we Kristo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:23: 23.Hashize iminsi myinshi Abayuda bajya inama yo kumwica,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:24: 24.ariko Sawuli amenya inama yabo. Bubikirira ku marembo ku manywa na nijoro, kugira ngo bamwice.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:25: 25.Abigishwa be ni ko kumujyana nijoro, bamucisha mu nkike z’amabuye, bamumanurira mu gitebo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:26: 26.Asohoye i Yerusalemu agerageza kwifatanya n’abigishwa, ariko bose baramutinya ntibemera ko ari umwigishwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:27: 27.Maze Barinaba aramujyana amushyira intumwa, azisobanurira uko yabonye Umwami Yesu mu nzira, kandi uko yavuganye na we, n’uko yavuze ashize amanga mu izina rya Yesu i Damasiko.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:28: 28.Abana na bo i Yerusalemu akajya abasura, abwiriza mu izina ry’Umwami ashize amanga,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:29: 29.akaganira n’Abayuda ba kigiriki ajya impaka na bo, bigeza ubwo na bo bashaka kumwica.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:30: 30.Ariko bene Data babimenye bamujyana i Kayisariya, bamwohereza i Taruso.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:31: Petero akiza Ayineya31.Nuko Itorero ryose ryari i Yudaya hose n’i Galilaya n’i Samariya rigira amahoro, rirakomezwa kandi rigenda ryubaha Umwami Yesu, rifashwa n’Umwuka Wera riragwira.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:32: 32.Nuko Petero ajya hose kubasura, ajya no ku bera batuye i Luda,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:33: 33.asangayo umugabo witwaga Ayineya wamaze imyaka munani atava ku buriri, kuko yari aremaye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:34: 34.Petero aramubwira ati “Ayineya, Yesu Kristo aragukijije, haguruka wisasire.” Uwo mwanya arahaguruka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:35: 35.Abatuye i Luda n’i Saroni bose bamubonye bahindukirira Umwami Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:36: Petero azura Tabita36.Kandi i Yopa hari umugore w’umwigishwa witwaga Tabita, risobanurwa ngo “Doruka”. Uwo mugore yagiraga imirimo myiza myinshi n’ubuntu bwinshi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:37: 37.Muri iyo minsi ararwara arapfa, bamaze kumwuhagira bamushyira mu cyumba cyo hejuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:38: 38.Kandi kuko i Luda hari bugufi bw’i Yopa, abigishwa bumvise ko Petero ari yo ari, bamutumaho abantu babiri bamwinginga bati “Ngwino uze iwacu, ntutinde.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:39: 39.Petero arahaguruka, ajyana na bo. Asohoyeyo bamujyana muri icyo cyumba cyo hejuru, abapfakazi bose bahagarara iruhande rwe barira, berekana amakanzu n’imyenda Doruka yababoheye akiriho.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:40: 40.Petero abaheza bose, arapfukama arasenga, ahindukirira intumbi ati “Tabita, haguruka.” Arambura amaso, abonye Petero arabyuka aricara.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:41: 41.Petero amufata ukuboko aramuhagurutsa. Maze ahamagara abera n’abapfakazi, amubaha ari muzima.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:42: 42.Bimenyekana i Yopa hose, benshi bizera Umwami.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:9:43: 43.Nuko amara iminsi myinshi i Yopa, acumbitse kwa Simoni w’umuhazi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:1: Marayika abonekera Koruneliyo1.Hariho umuntu w’i Kayisariya witwaga Koruneliyo, umutware utwara umutwe w’abasirikare wo mu ngabo zitwa Italiyana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:2: 2.Yari umuntu w’umunyadini wubahana Imana n’abo mu rugo rwe bose, wagiriraga abantu ubuntu bwinshi, agasenga Imana ubudasiba.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:3: 3.Abona ku mugaragaro mu iyerekwa marayika w’Imana yinjiye iwe nko mu isaha ya cyenda y’umunsi, aramuhamagara ati “Koruneliyo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:4: 4.Aramutumbira, aramutinya, aramubaza ati “Ni iki Mwami?” Aramusubiza ati “Gusenga kwawe n’ubuntu bwawe byazamukiye kuba urwibutso imbere y’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:5: 5.Kandi none tuma abantu i Yopa, utumire umuntu witwa Simoni wahimbwe Petero.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:6: 6.Acumbitse kwa Simoni w’umuhazi, urugo rwe ruri iruhande rw’inyanja.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:7: 7.Marayika wavuganaga na we amaze kugenda, ahamagara abagaragu be babiri, n’umusirikare w’umunyadini wo mu bamukorera iteka,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:8: 8.amaze kubabwira ibyo byose, abatuma i Yopa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:9: Ibyo Petero yeretswe9.Bukeye bw’aho bakiri mu nzira benda gusohora mu mudugudu, Petero ajya hejuru y’inzu gusenga nko mu isaha ya gatandatu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:10: 10.Arasonza ashaka kurya, bakibyitegura aba nk’urota
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:11: 11.abona ijuru rikingutse, maze ikintu kiramanuka gisa n’umwenda w’umukomahasi, gifashwe ku binyita bine kijya hasi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:12: 12.Harimo inyamaswa z’amoko yose zigenza amaguru ane, n’ibikururuka hasi byose, n’ibiguruka mu kirere byose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:13: 13.Ijwi riramubwira riti “Haguruka Petero, ubage urye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:14: 14.Petero ati “Oya Mwami, kuko ntigeze kurya ikizira cyangwa igihumanya.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:15: 15.Iryo jwi rimusubiza ubwa kabiri riti “Ibyo Imana ihumanuye wibyita ibizira.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:16: 16.Biba bityo gatatu, icyo kintu giherako gisubizwa mu ijuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:17: 17.Petero agishidikanya mu mutima we uko ibyo yeretswe bisobanurwa, abantu batumwe na Koruneliyo bamaze kubaza inzu ya Simoni iyo ari yo, bahagarara ku irembo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:18: 18.barahamagara babaza yuko Simoni wahimbwe Petero acumbitsemo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:19: 19.Petero agitekereza ibyo yeretswe, Umwuka aramubwira ati “Dore abantu batatu baragushaka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:20: 20.Haguruka umanuke ujyane na bo udashidikanya, kuko ari jye ubatumye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:21: 21.Petero aramanuka asanga abo bantu arababwira ati “Ni jyewe uwo mushaka, mwazanywe n’iki?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:22: 22.Baramusubiza bati “Koruneliyo umutware utwara umutwe w’abasirikare ijana, umuntu ukiranuka wubaha Imana, ushimwa n’ubwoko bwose bw’Abayuda, yabwirijwe na marayika wera kugutumira, ngo uze iwe yumve amagambo yawe.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:23: 23.Nuko arabinjiza arabacumbikira. Petero ajya kwa Koruneliyo Bukeye bw’aho Petero arahaguruka avanayo na bo, na bene Data bamwe b’i Yopa na bo bajyana na we.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:24: 24.Bukeye bagera i Kayisariya, basanga Koruneliyo abategereje, yateranije bene wabo n’incuti z’amagara.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:25: 25.Petero agiye kwinjira, Koruneliyo aramusanganira, yikubita imbere y’ibirenge bye, aramuramya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:26: 26.Ariko Petero aramuhagurutsa ati “Haguruka, nanjye ndi umuntu nkawe.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:27: 27.Bakivugana arinjira, asanga abantu benshi bahateraniye
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:28: 28.arababwira ati “Muzi yuko kizira ko Umuyuda yifatanya n’uw’ubundi bwoko cyangwa ko amugenderera, ariko jyeweho Imana yanyeretse ko ntagira umuntu nita ikizira cyangwa igihumanya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:29: 29.Ni cyo cyatumye ntanga kuza ntumiwe. None ndababaza icyo muntumiriye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:30: 30.Koruneliyo ati “Dore uyu ni umunsi wa kane, uhereye ubwo nari ndi mu nzu yanjye nsenga magingo aya ari yo saa cyenda, nuko umuntu ahagarara imbere yanjye yambaye imyenda irabagirana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:31: 31.arambwira ati ‘Koruneliyo, gusenga kwawe kwarumviswe, n’ubuntu bwawe bwibutswe imbere y’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:32: 32.Nuko tuma i Yopa, utumireyo Simoni wahimbwe Petero, acumbitse kwa Simoni w’umuhazi hafi y’inyanja.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:33: 33.Uwo mwanya ndagutumira, nawe wakoze neza ubwo uje. Nuko none turi hano twese imbere y’Imana, dushaka kumva ibyo Umwami Imana yagutegetse kutubwira.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:34: 34.Petero aterura amagambo ati “Ni ukuri menye yuko Imana itarobanura ku butoni,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:35: 35.ahubwo mu mahanga yose uyubaha agakora ibyo gukiranuka iramwemera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:36: 36.Ijambo ry’ubutumwa bwiza bw’amahoro Imana yatumye ku bana ba Isirayeli ivugishije Yesu, ari we Mwami wa bose,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:37: 37.iryo jambo murarizi ryamamaye i Yudaya hose, rihereye i Galilaya hanyuma y’umubatizo Yohana yabwirizaga,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:38: 38.ni irya Yesu w’i Nazareti, uko Imana yamusutseho Umwuka Wera n’imbaraga, akagenda agirira abantu neza, agakiza abo Satani atwaza igitugu, kuko Imana yari iri kumwe na we.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:39: 39.Natwe turi abagabo bo guhamya ibyo yakoreye mu gihugu cy’Abayuda byose n’i Yerusalemu: uwo bamwicishije kumubamba ku giti,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:40: 40.ariko Imana imuzura ku munsi wa gatatu, imwerekana ku mugaragaro.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:41: 41.Icyakora ntiyamweretse abantu bose, ahubwo yamweretse abagabo yatoranije bitari byaba, ni twebwe abasangiraga na we amaze kuzuka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:42: 42.Adutegeka kubwiriza abantu no guhamya ko ari we Imana yategetse kuba Umucamanza w’abazima n’uw’abapfuye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:43: 43.Abahanuzi bose baramuhamije, bavuga yuko umwizera wese azababarirwa ibyaha ku bw’izina rye.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:44: 44.Petero akivuga ibyo, Umwuka Wera amanukira abumvise ayo magambo bose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:45: 45.Abizeye bo mu bakebwe bajyanye na Petero barumirwa bose, kuko n’abanyamahanga na bo bahawe Umwuka Wera akaba abasutsweho,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:46: 46.kuko bumvise bavuga izindi ndimi bahimbaza Imana. Maze Petero arababaza ati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:47: 47.“Aba ngaba bahawe Umwuka Wera nkatwe, ni nde ubasha kubima amazi ngo batabatizwa?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:10:48: 48.Ategeka ko babatizwa mu izina rya Yesu Kristo. Baherako baramwinginga ngo amareyo iminsi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:1: Petero yiregura ku Bakristo b’Abayuda1.Intumwa na bene Data bari i Yudaya bumvise yuko abanyamahanga na bo bemeye ijambo ry’Imana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:2: 2.nuko Petero azamutse i Yerusalemu abo mu bakebwe bajya impaka na we bati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:3: 3.“Ko wagendereye abatakebwe, ugasangira na bo?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:4: 4.Petero aterura amagambo, abibasobanurira uko bikurikirana ati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:5: 5.“Nari mu mudugudu witwa Yopa nsenga, nerekwa nko mu nzozi ikintu gisa n’umwenda w’umukomahasi kimanuka kivuye mu ijuru, gifashwe ku binyita bine kinzaho.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:6: 6.Ndagitumbira ndacyitegereza, mbonamo ibigenza amaguru ane byo mu isi, n’inyamaswa z’inkazi, n’ibikururuka hasi, n’ibiguruka mu kirere.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:7: 7.Kandi numva ijwi rimbwira riti ‘Haguruka Petero, ubage urye.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:8: 8.Nanjye nti ‘Oya Mwami, kuko ikizira cyangwa igihumanya kitigeze kugera mu kanwa kanjye.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:9: 9.Maze ijwi rivugiye mu ijuru rinsubiza ubwa kabiri riti ‘Ibyo Imana ihumanuye wibyita ibizira.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:10: 10.Biba bityo gatatu, nuko byose birazamurwa bisubizwa mu ijuru.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:11: 11.Uwo mwanya abagabo batatu bavuye i Kayisariya bantumweho, bahagarara imbere y’inzu twari turimo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:12: 12.Umwuka antegeka kujyana na bo ntaruhije nshidikanya. Kandi bene Data aba uko ari batandatu, turajyana twinjira mu nzu y’uwo mugabo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:13: 13.Adutekerereza uko yabonye marayika mu nzu ye ahagaze amubwira ati ‘Tuma i Yopa, utumire Simoni wahimbwe Petero,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:14: 14.azakubwira amagambo azagukizanya n’abo mu rugo rwawe bose.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:15: 15.Nteruye amagambo, Umwuka Wera arabamanukira nk’uko natwe yatumanukiye bwa mbere.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:16: 16.Nibuka rya jambo ry’Umwami Yesu, iryo yavugaga ati ‘Yohana yababatirishaga amazi, ariko mwebweho muzabatirishwa Umwuka Wera.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:17: 17.Nuko ubwo Imana yabahaye impano ihwanye n’iyo natwe twahawe, ubwo twizeraga Umwami Yesu Kristo, ndi nde wo kuvuguruza Imana?”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:18: 18.Bumvise ibyo barihorera, bahimbaza Imana bati “Nuko noneho Imana ihaye n’abanyamahanga kwihana, kugira ngo na bo bahabwe ubugingo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:19: Ubutumwa bwiza bugera muri Antiyokiya19.Nuko abatatanijwe n’akarengane katewe n’ibya Sitefano bagera i Foyinike n’i Kupuro no muri Antiyokiya, ari nta wundi babwira ijambo keretse Abayuda bonyine.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:20: 20.Ariko bamwe muri bo b’i Kupuro n’ab’i Kurene bageze muri Antiyokiya, bavugana n’Abagiriki na bo bababwira ubutumwa bwiza bw’Umwami Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:21: 21.Ukuboko k’Umwami kuba kumwe na bo, abantu benshi barizera bahindukirira Umwami.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:22: 22.Iyo nkuru irumvikana igera mu matwi y’itorero ry’i Yerusalemu, batuma Barinaba muri Antiyokiya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:23: 23.Asohoyeyo kandi abonye ubuntu bw’Imana aranezerwa, abahugura bose ati “Mugume mu Mwami Yesu mumaramaje mu mitima yanyu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:24: 24.Kuko Barinaba yari umunyangesonziza, wuzuye Umwuka Wera no kwizera. Abantu benshi bongererwa Umwami Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:25: 25.Bukeye avayo ajya i Taruso gushaka Sawuli,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:26: 26.amubonye amujyana mu Antiyokiya. Bamarayo umwaka wose baterana n’ab’Itorero, bigisha abantu benshi, kandi muri Antiyokiya ni ho abigishwa batangiriye kwitwa Abakristo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:27: 27.Muri iyo minsi abahanuzi bava i Yerusalemu, bajya mu Antiyokiya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:28: 28.Nuko umwe muri bo witwaga Agabo, arahaguruka arahanura abwirijwe n’Umwuka ati “Inzara nyinshi izatera mu isi yose.” (Ni yo yateye ku ngoma ya Kilawudiyo.)
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:29: 29.Nuko abigishwa bagambirira koherereza bene Data batuye i Yudaya imfashanyo, umuntu wese akurikije ubutunzi bwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:11:30: 30.Babigenza batyo, babyoherereza abakuru babihaye Barinaba na Sawuli.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:1: Herode ashaka kwica Petero, marayika aramukiza1.Nuko muri icyo gihe Umwami Herode afatira abo mu Itorero bamwe kubagirira nabi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:2: 2.Yicisha Yakobo inkota, mwene se wa Yohana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:3: 3.Abonye ko anejeje Abayuda, ariyongeza afata na Petero. Icyo gihe hari mu minsi y’imitsima idasembuwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:4: 4.Amaze kumufata amushyira mu nzu y’imbohe, amuha abasirikare cumi na batandatu kumurinda bane bane, agira ngo azamushyire abantu Pasika ishize.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:5: 5.Nuko Petero arindirwa mu nzu y’imbohe, ariko ab’Itorero bagira umwete wo kumusabira ku Mana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:6: 6.Herode araye ari bumusohore, iryo joro Petero yari asinziriye hagati y’abasirikare babiri, aboheshejwe iminyururu ibiri, abarinzi na bo bari ku rugi barinda inzu y’imbohe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:7: 7.Nuko marayika w’Umwami Imana ahagarara aho, umucyo waka mu nzu, marayika akoma Petero mu mbavu aramukangura ati “Byuka n’ingoga.” Iminyururu imuva ku maboko iragwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:8: 8.Marayika aramubwira ati “Kenyera ukwete inkweto zawe.” Abigenza atyo. Arongera aramubwira ati “Wifubike umwitero wawe, unkurikire.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:9: 9.Arasohoka aramukurikira, ariko ntiyamenya ibyo marayika akoze ko ari iby’ukuri, ahubwo agira ngo abirose mu nzozi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:10: 10.Banyuze ku barinzi ba mbere no ku ba kabiri, bagera ku irembo rikingishijwe urugi rw’icyuma rijya mu murwa. Rurabikingurira ubwarwo barasohoka banyura inzira imwe, uwo mwanya marayika amusiga aho.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:11: 11.Petero agaruye umutima aribwira ati “Noneho menye by’ukuri yuko Umwami Imana yatumye marayika wayo, ikankura mu maboko ya Herode, ikankiza ibyo ubwoko bw’Abayuda bwategerezaga byose.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:12: 12.Akibitekereza atyo, asohora kwa Mariya nyina wa Yohana wahimbwe Mariko, aho abantu benshi bari bateraniye basenga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:13: 13.Petero akomanga ku rugi rw’irembo, umuja witwaga Rode ajya kubyumva.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:14: 14.Amenya ijwi rya Petero, ibinezaneza bimubuza gukingura, nuko yirukanka asubira mu nzu ababwira yuko Petero ahagaze ku irembo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:15: 15.Baramusubiza bati “Urasaze!” Ariko akomeza guhamya ko ari koko. Bati “Ahubwo ni marayika we.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:16: 16.Ariko Petero akomeza gukomanga, bakinguye basanga ari we koko barumirwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:17: 17.Arabamama, abasobanurira uko Umwami Imana yamukuye mu nzu y’imbohe, arababwira ati “Mubitekerereze Yakobo na bene Data bandi.” Arasohoka ajya ahandi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:18: 18.Bukeye abasirikare bashiguka imitima cyane, bananirwa kumenya uko Petero yabaye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:19: 19.Herode na we amushatse aramubura abaza abo barinzi, ategeka ko babica. Ava i Yudaya ajya i Kayisariya, aba ari ho aba.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:20: Urupfu rwa Herode20.Bukeye Herode arakarira ab’i Tiro n’i Sidoni, ariko bahuza inama baramusanga, bahongera Bulasito umutware w’abashashi b’umwami, basaba amahoro kuko igihugu cyabo cyahahaga mu cy’Umwami Herode.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:21: 21.Nuko ku munsi wategetswe Herode yambara imyenda y’ubugabe, yicara ku ntebe y’ubwami arabaganirira.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:22: 22.Abantu barasakuza bati “Yemwe noneho ni ijwi ry’Imana, si iry’umuntu!”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:23: 23.Ariko muri ako kanya marayika w’Umwami Imana aramukumbanya kuko adahaye Imana icyubahiro, aherako agwa inyo umwuka urahera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:24: 24.Ariko ijambo ry’Imana riragwira riramamara.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:12:25: 25.Kandi Barinaba na Sawuli bamaze kubashyikiriza za mfashanyo bahawe, bava i Yerusalemu basubirayo, bajyana Yohana wahimbwe Mariko.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:1: Urugendo rwa mbere rwa Pawulo rwo kuvuga ubutumwa1.Mu Itorero ryo muri Antiyokiya hariho abahanuzi n’abigisha, ari bo Barinaba na Simoni witwaga Nigeru, na Lukiyosi w’Umunyakurene na Manayeni wareranywe n’Umwami Herode, hariho na Sawuli.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:2: 2.Ubwo basengaga Umwami Imana biyiriza ubusa, Umwuka Wera yarababwiye ati “Mundobanurire Barinaba na Sawuli, bankorere umurimo mbahamagariye gukora.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:3: 3.Nuko bamaze kwiyiriza ubusa no gusenga, baherako babarambikaho ibiganza barabohereza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:4: Ibyabaye i Kupuro bya Eluma w’umukonikoni4.Nuko batumwe n’Umwuka Wera bajya i Selukiya. Batsukiraho barambuka, bafata i Kupuro.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:5: 5.Bageze i Salamini bamamaza ijambo ry’Imana mu masinagogi y’Abayuda, Yohana na we abafasha.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:6: 6.Baromboreza muri icyo kirwa cyose bagera i Pafo, basangayo umukonikoni w’Umuyuda, umuhanuzi w’ibinyoma witwaga Bariyesu,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:7: 7.ari kumwe n’umutware Serugiyo Pawulo wari umunyabwenge. Uwo ahamagaza Barinaba na Sawuli, ashaka kumva ijambo ry’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:8: 8.Ariko Eluma w’umukonikoni (izina rye ni ko risobanurwa) abagisha impaka, ashaka kuyobya uwo mutware ngo atizera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:9: 9.Maze Sawuli, ari we Pawulo, yuzuye Umwuka Wera aramutumbira ati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:10: 10.“Wa muntu we, wuzuye uburiganya n’ububi bwose, wa mwana wa Satani we, wa mwanzi w’ibyo gukiranuka byose we, ntuzarorera kugoreka inzira z’Umwami Imana zigororotse?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:11: 11.Nuko dore ukuboko k’Umwami kuraguhannye, uraba impumyi utarora izuba, ubimarane iminsi.” Muri ako kanya igihu kiramugwira, n’umwijima ucura mu maso ye, arindagira akabakaba ashaka abo kumurandata.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:12: 12.Uwo mutware abonye ibibaye arizera, atangarira kwigisha k’Umwami Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:13: Pawulo yigisha muri Antiyokiya y’i Pisidiya13.Pawulo n’abo bari kumwe batsukira i Pafo, barambuka bafata i Peruga y’i Pamfiliya, Yohana abasigayo ajya i Yerusalemu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:14: 14.Ariko bo bava i Peruga, bararomboreza bagera muri Antiyokiya y’i Pisidiya. Ku munsi w’isabato binjira mu isinagogi baricara.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:15: 15.Bamaze gusoma mu mategeko no mu byahanuwe, abakuru b’isinagogi babatumaho bati “Bagabo bene Data, niba mufite amagambo yo guhugura abantu nimuyatubwire.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:16: 16.Pawulo arahaguruka arabamama, arababwira ati “Bagabo b’Abisirayeli, namwe abubaha Imana nimwumve.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:17: 17.Imana y’ubu bwoko bwa Isirayeli yatoranije ba sogokuruza, kandi ishyira abantu hejuru ubwo bari abasuhuke mu gihugu cya Egiputa, ibakurishayo ukuboko gukomeye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:18: 18.Yihanganira ingeso zabo nk’imyaka mirongo ine bari mu butayu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:19: 19.Imaze kurimburira amahanga arindwi mu gihugu cy’i Kanani, ibaha igihugu cyabo ho gakondo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:20: 20.Maze hashize nk’imyaka magana ane na mirongo itanu, ibaha abacamanza kugeza ku muhanuzi Samweli.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:21: 21.“Bukeye basaba Imana kubaha umwami, nuko ibaha Sawuli mwene Kishi wo mu muryango wa Benyamini, amara imyaka mirongo ine ari ku ngoma.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:22: 22.Imukuyeho ibahagurukiriza Dawidi, iramwimika iramuhamya iti ‘Mbonye Dawidi mwene Yesayi, umuntu umeze nk’uko umutima wanjye ushaka, azakora ibyo nshaka byose.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:23: 23.Mu rubyaro rw’uwo ni ho Imana yakomoreye Abisirayeli Umukiza Yesu, nk’uko yabisezeranije.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:24: 24.Yohana yamubanjirije ataraza, yigisha ubwoko bw’Abisirayeli bwose iby’umubatizo wo kwihana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:25: 25.Nuko Yohana yenda kurangiza urugendo rwe arababaza ati ‘Mutekereza ko ndi nde?’ Ati ‘Si ndi we, ahubwo hariho uzaza hanyuma yanjye, ntibinkwiriye ko napfundura udushumi tw’inkweto zo mu birenge bye.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:26: 26.“Bene Data, bana b’umuryango wa Aburahamu namwe abubaha Imana, kuri twe ni ho ijambo ry’ako gakiza ryatumwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:27: 27.Kuko abatuye i Yerusalemu n’abakuru babo batamenye uwo, cyangwa amagambo y’ubuhanuzi asomwa ku masabato yose, ni cyo cyatumye babusohoza ubwo bamuciraga urubanza rwo gupfa,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:28: 28.kandi nubwo babuze impamvu zo kumwicisha basaba Pilato kumwica.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:29: 29.Bamaze gusohoza ibyanditswe kuri we byose, bamumanura ku giti bamushyira mu mva.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:31: 31.Iminsi myinshi abonekera abajyanaga na we ava i Galilaya ajya i Yerusalemu, abo ni bo bagabo bo kumuhamya ubu imbere y’abo bantu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:32: 32.Natwe turababwira inkuru nziza y’isezerano ryasezeranijwe ba sogokuruza,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:33: 33.yuko Imana ari twe yabisohorejeho, twebwe abana babo ubwo yazuraga Yesu, nk’uko byanditswe muri Zaburi ya kabiri ngo ‘Uri Umwana wanjye, uyu munsi ndakubyaye.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:34: 34.Kandi kuko yamuzuye ubutazasubira mu iborero, ni cyo cyatumye avuga atya ati ‘Nzabaha imigisha ya Dawidi itazakuka.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:35: 35.No muri Zaburi yindi yaravuze ati ‘Ntuzakundire Uwera wawe ko abora.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:36: 36.Kuko Dawidi amaze gukora ibyo Imana yashatse mu gihe cye arasinzira, ashyirwa kuri ba sekuruza arabora,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:37: 37.ariko uwo Imana yazuye ntarakabora.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:38: 38.Nuko bagabo bene Data, mumenye ko ari muri uwo tubabwira kubabarirwa ibyaha,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:39: 39.kandi uwizera wese atsindishirizwa na we mu bintu byose, ibyo amategeko ya Mose atabashaga kubatsindishiriza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:40: 40.Nuko mwirinde kugira ngo ibyavuzwe n’abahanuzi bitabasohoraho ngo
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:41: 41.‘Dore mwa banyagasuzuguro mwe, Mutangare murimbuke, Kuko nkora umurimo mu gihe cyanyu, Uwo mutazemera naho umuntu yawubasobanurira.’ ”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:42: 42.Bagisohoka, barabinginga ngo bazongere kubabwira ayo magambo ku isabato ikurikiyeho.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:43: 43.Iteraniro risohotse, benshi mu Bayuda n’ababakurikije bakubaha Imana, bakurikira Pawulo na Barinaba. Na bo bavugana na bo, barabahugura ngo bashishikarire kuguma mu buntu bw’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:44: Abayuda banga agakiza, Pawulo ahindukirira abanyamahanga44.Ku isabato ikurikiraho, ab’umudugudu hafi ya bose bateranira kumva ijambo ry’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:45: 45.Ariko Abayuda babonye abantu ko ari benshi bagira ishyari ryinshi, bagisha impaka ibyo Pawulo avuga bamutuka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:46: 46.Pawulo na Barinaba bavuga bashize amanga bati “Byari bikwiriye ko muba ari mwe mubanza kubwirwa ijambo ry’Imana, ariko none ubwo muryanze, kandi ntimwirebe ko mukwiriye ubugingo buhoraho, ngaho duhindukiriye abanyamahanga,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:47: 47.kuko uku ari ko Umwami yadutegetse ati ‘Ngushyiriyeho kuba umucyo w’abanyamahanga, Ngo ujyane agakiza kurinda ugeza ku mpera y’isi.’ ”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:48: 48.Abanyamahanga babyumvise batyo barishima bahimbaza ijambo ry’Imana, abari batoranirijwe ubugingo buhoraho bose barizera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:49: 49.Ijambo ry’Umwami Yesu rikwira muri icyo gihugu cyose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:50: 50.Ariko Abayuda boshya abagore b’icyubahiro bubaha Imana n’abakuru b’uwo mudugudu, bagira ngo barenganye Pawulo na Barinaba babirukane mu gihugu cyabo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:51: 51.Na bo babakunkumurira umukungugu wo mu birenge byabo, bagera mu Ikoniyo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:13:52: 52.Abigishwa buzura umunezero n’Umwuka Wera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:1: Abo muri Ikoniyo birukana intumwa1.Pawulo na Barinaba bari muri Ikoniyo binjirana mu isinagogi y’Abayuda, bavuga amagambo atuma Abayuda n’Abagiriki benshi cyane bizera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:2: 2.Ariko Abayuda batizeye boshya imitima y’abanyamahanga, bayangisha bene Data.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:3: 3.Nuko bamara iminsi myinshi bavuga bashize amanga, biringiye Umwami Yesu uhamya ijambo ry’ubuntu bwe, abaha gukora ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:4: 4.Ariko abantu bo muri uwo mudugudu birema ibice, bamwe bajya ku Bayuda, abandi bajya ku ntumwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:5: 5.Aho bigeze abanyamahanga n’Abayuda, na bo hamwe n’abatware babo bagerageza gutera intumwa, ngo bazigirire nabi no kubicisha amabuye,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:6: 6.ariko zirabimenya zihungira i Lusitira n’i Derube, imidugudu y’i Lukawoniyo, no mu gihugu gihereranye na ho,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:7: 7.zigumayo zibwira abantu ubutumwa bwiza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:8: Pawulo akiriza ikirema i Lusitira8.I Lusitira hariho umuntu wavutse aremaye ibirenge, ntabwo yari yarigeze atambuka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:9: 9.Uwo yumvise Pawulo avuga na we amuhanze amaso, abona ko afite kwizera kwamuhesha gukizwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:10: 10.Avuga ijwi rirenga ati “Byuka uhagarike ibirenge byawe weme.” Arabambaduka aratambuka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:11: 11.Abahateraniye babonye icyo Pawulo akoze, bavuga ijwi rirenga mu Runyalukayoniya bati “Imana zitumanukiyemo zishushanije n’abantu.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:12: 12.Maze Barinaba bamwita Zewu, na Pawulo bamwita Herume, kuko ari we warushaga kuvuga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:13: 13.Nuko umutambyi wa Zewu, ari yo yari ifite urusengero rwayo imbere y’umudugudu, azana amapfizi yambaye imyishywa ku irembo ry’umudugudu, ashaka gutamba igitambo we na rubanda rwari ruhari.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:14: 14.Ariko intumwa Barinaba na Pawulo babyumvise bashishimura imyenda, baturumbukira muri rubanda bavuga ijwi rirenga bati
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:15: 15.“Mwa bagabo mwe, ni iki gitumye mugira mutyo? Natwe turi abantu buntu, tumeze nkamwe kandi turababwira ubutumwa bwiza, ngo mureke ibyo bitagira icyo bibamarira muhindukirire Imana ihoraho, yaremye ijuru n’isi n’inyanja n’ibirimo byose,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:16: 16.ari na yo yakundiye amahanga yose mu bihe byashize kugendera mu migenzo yayo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:17: 17.Ariko ntiyirekeraho itagira icyo kuyihamya, kuko yabagiriraga neza mwese, ikabavubira imvura yo mu ijuru, ikabaha imyaka myiza ikabahaza ibyokurya, ikuzuza imitima yanyu umunezero.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:18: 18.Bamaze kuvuga ibyo, babuza rubanda gutamba ibitambo ariko bibaruhije cyane.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:19: Batera Pawulo amabuye19.Ariko Abayuda bavuye muri Antiyokiya no muri Ikoniyo baraza boshya rubanda, batera Pawulo amabuye, bamukurubanira inyuma y’umudugudu bibwira ko yapfuye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:20: 20.Abigishwa bamugose, arabyuka asubira mu mudugudu. Bukeye bwaho avayo, ajyana na Barinaba i Derube.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:21: 21.Bamaze kubwira abantu ubutumwa bwiza muri uwo mudugudu no guhindura benshi abigishwa, basubira i Lusitira no muri Ikoniyo no mu Antiyokiya,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:22: 22.bakomeza imitima y’abigishwa, babahugura ngo bagumirize kwizera. Bababwira uburyo dukwiriye guca mu makuba menshi, niba dushaka kwinjira mu bwami bw’Imana.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:23: 23.Nuko bamaze kubatoraniriza abakuru mu matorero yose, basenga biyiriza ubusa, babaragiza Umwami Yesu uwo bizeye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:24: 24.Banyura i Pisidiya bagera i Pamfiliya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:25: 25.Bamaze kuvuga ijambo ry’Imana i Peruga, baramanuka bajya muri Ataliya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:26: 26.Batsukira aho barambuka bafata mu Antiyokiya, aho bari bararagirijwe ubuntu bw’Imana ku bw’umurimo barangije.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:27: 27.Bagezeyo bateranya Itorero, babatekerereza ibyo Imana yakoranye na bo byose, n’uko yugururiye abanyamahanga irembo ryo kwizera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:14:28: 28.Bamarayo iminsi myinshi bari hamwe n’abigishwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:1: Impaka zivuye ku byo gukebwa1.Nuko abantu bamwe bavuye i Yudaya bigishaga bene Data bati “Nimudakebwa nk’uko umugenzo wa Mose uri, ntimubasha gukizwa.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:2: 2.Habaho impaka nyinshi n’imburanya kuri Pawulo na Barinaba n’abo bantu, maze bene Data bahuza inama yo gutuma Pawulo na Barinaba n’abandi muri bo, kujya i Yerusalemu ku ntumwa n’abakuru kugira ngo bajye inama y’izo mpaka.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:3: 3.Abo bamaze guherekezwa n’Itorero banyura i Foyinike n’i Samariya, basobanurira bene Data uburyo abanyamahanga bahindukiriye Imana. Ibyo bituma bose banezerwa umunezero mwinshi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:4: 4.Basohoye i Yerusalemu, ab’Itorero n’intumwa n’abakuru barabakira. Nuko na bo babatekerereza ibyo Imana yakoranye na bo byose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:5: 5.Ariko bamwe bo mu gice cy’Abafarisayo bizeye barahaguruka, bavuga yuko abanyamahanga bakwiriye gukebwa no gutegekwa kwitondera amategeko ya Mose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:6: Inama yabereye Yerusalemu6.Intumwa n’abakuru bateranira kujya inama y’ayo magambo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:7: 7.Habaho imburanya nyinshi, maze Petero arahaguruka, arababwira ati “Bagabo bene Data, muzi yuko kera Imana yantoranyije muri mwe, kugira ngo akanwa kanjye abe ari ko abanyamahanga bumvamo ijambo ry’ubutumwa bwiza bizere.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:8: 8.Imana irondora imitima y’abantu yarabahamije, ubwo yabahaye Umwuka Wera nk’uko yamuduhaye natwe.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:9: 9.Ntiyashyiraho itandukaniro ryacu na bo, ahubwo yogesheje imitima yabo kwizera.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:10: 10.Nuko ni iki gitumye mugerageza Imana, mwikoreza abigishwa imitwaro ba sogokuruza batashoboye kwikorera, ndetse natwe ni uko?
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:11: 11.Ahubwo twizera yuko ubuntu bw’Umwami Yesu ari bwo buzadukiza, nk’uko na bo bazakizwa na bwo.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:12: 12.Abahateraniye bose barahora, bumva uko Barinaba na Pawulo babatekerereza ibimenyetso n’ibitangaza byose Imana yabahaye gukora mu banyamahanga.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:13: 13.Barangije kuvuga Yakobo aravuga ati “Bagabo bene Data, munyumve.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:14: 14.Simoni yabatekerereje uko Imana yatangiye kugenderera abanyamahanga, kubatoranyamo ubwoko bwo kubaha izina ryayo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:15: 15.Amagambo y’abahanuzi ahura n’ibyo nk’uko byanditswe ngo
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:16: 16.‘Hanyuma y’ibyo nzahindukira, Nongere nubake inzu ya Dawidi yaguye, Nzasana ahasenyutse hayo nyihagarike,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:17: 17.Kugira ngo abantu basigaye bashakane Uwiteka, N’abanyamahanga bose bitirirwe izina ryanjye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:18: 18.Ni ko Uwiteka avuga, ari we ukora ibyo byose, Abimenye uhereye kera kose.’
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:19: 19.“Ni cyo gitumye ku bwanjye ntegeka ko tureka kurushya abo mu banyamahanga bahindukirira Imana,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:20: 20.ahubwo tubandikire ngo bareke ibihumanya by’ibishushanyo bisengwa, no gusambana, n’ibinizwe, n’amaraso,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:21: 21.kuko uhereye kera kose Mose afite mu midugudu yose ababwiriza ibye, bisomerwa mu masinagogi ku masabato yose.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:22: Urwandiko Itorero ryandikiye abanyamahanga22.Maze intumwa n’abakuru hamwe n’ab’Itorero bose bashima gutoranya abagabo muri bo: ni Yuda witwaga Barisaba na Sila, abantu bakomeye muri bene Data ngo babatumane na Pawulo na Barinaba muri Antiyokiya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:23: 23.Bandika urwandiko bararubaha, rwanditsemo ngo “Intumwa na bene Data bakuru turabatashya, bene Data bo mu banyamahanga bari muri Antiyokiya n’i Siriya n’i Kilikiya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:24: 24.Kuko twumvise yuko abantu bavuye muri twe bababwiye amagambo yo guhagarika imitima yanyu, no kuyitera gushidikanya kandi tutabibategetse,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:25: 25.twashimye guhuza inama yo gutoranya aba bagabo no kubabatumanaho, n’abo dukunda Barinaba na Pawulo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:26: 26.abantu bahaze amagara yabo ku bw’izina ry’Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:27: 27.Nuko dutumye Yuda na Sila, na bo ubwabo bazababwira n’ururimi bimwe n’ibi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:28: 28.Umwuka Wera hamwe natwe, twashimye kutabikoreza undi mutwaro wose keretse ibi bikwiriye:
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:29: 29.kwirinda inyama zaterekerejwe ibishushanyo bisengwa, n’amaraso, n’ibinizwe, no gusambana. Ibyo nimubyirinda muzaba mukoze neza. Nuko murabeho.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:30: Bajyana urwandiko muri Antiyokiya30.Nuko bamaze gusezererwa baramanuka bajya muri Antiyokiya, bateranya Itorero babaha urwandiko.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:31: 31.Barusomye bishimira uko guhugurwa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:32: 32.Yuda na Sila kuko na bo bari abahanuzi, bahuguza bene Data amagambo menshi barabakomeza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:33: 33.Bamaze iminsi bene Data babasezerera amahoro, ngo basubire ku babatumye.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:34: 34.Ariko Sila we ashima gusigarayo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:35: 35.Pawulo na Barinaba na bo baguma muri Antiyokiya, bigisha abantu bababwira ijambo ry’Umwami Yesu, bafatanyije n’abandi benshi.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:36: Urugendo rwa kabiri rwa Pawulo36.Hashize iminsi Pawulo abwira Barinaba ati “Dusubire tugenderere bene Data bo mu midugudu yose, aho twavuze ijambo ry’Umwami Yesu tumenye uko bameze.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:37: 37.Barinaba ashaka kujyana na Yohana witwaga Mariko,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:38: 38.ariko Pawulo ntiyashima kumujyana, kuko yabahanye i Pamfiliya ntajyane na bo mu murimo.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:39: 39.Nuko bagira intonganya nyinshi bituma batandukana, Barinaba ajyana Mariko atsukiraho, arambuka afata i Kupuro.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:40: 40.Pawulo na we atoranya Sila, avayo bene Data bamaze kumuragiza ubuntu bw’Umwami Yesu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:15:41: 41.Anyura i Siriya n’i Kilikiya, akomeza amatorero.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:1: Ibya Timoteyo1.Nuko agera i Derube n’i Lusitira. Hariyo umwigishwa witwaga Timoteyo umwana w’Umuyudakazi wizeye, ariko se yari Umugiriki.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:2: 2.Yashimwaga na bene Data b’i Lusitira n’abo muri Ikoniyo,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:3: 3.uwo Pawulo ashaka ko bajyana. Nuko aramujyana aramukeba ku bw’Abayuda bari bahari, kuko bose bari bazi yuko se ari Umugiriki.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:4: 4.Bakinyura mu mudugudu, bagenda babwira ab’aho ibyo intumwa n’abakuru b’i Yerusalemu bategetse ngo babyitondere.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:5: 5.Nuko amatorero akomerera mu byo kwizera, umubare wabo ukomeza kugwira iminsi yose.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:6: Pawulo ahamagarwa kujya i Makedoniya6.Bukeye banyura mu gihugu cy’i Furugiya n’i Galatiya, babuzwa n’Umwuka Wera kuvuga ijambo ry’Imana muri Asiya.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:7: 7.Bageze ahabangikanye n’i Musiya, bagerageza kujya i Bituniya, ariko Umwuka wa Yesu ntiyabakundira.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:8: 8.Nuko banyura i Musiya bagera i Tirowa.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:9: 9.Nijoro Pawulo ararota, abona umugabo w’Umunyamakedoniya ahagaze amwinginga ati “Ambuka uze i Makedoniya udutabare.”
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:10: 10.Amaze kurota izo nzozi, uwo mwanya dushaka kujya i Makedoniya, kuko tumenye yuko Imana iduhamagariye kubabwira ubutumwa bwiza.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:11: 11.Nuko dutsukira i Tirowa, turaromboreza tujya i Samotirake, bukeye bwaho tugera i Neyapoli,
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:12: 12.tuvayo tugera i Filipi, ni umudugudu wa mbere wo mu ntara y’i Makedoniya wubatswe n’Abaroma bahimukiye. Tumara iminsi muri uwo mudugudu.
ibyakozwe_n_intumwa:16:13: 13.Ku munsi w’isabato tuva mu mudugudu tujya ku mugezi inyuma y’irembo, dukeka yuko hariho ahantu ho gusengera. Turicara tuvugana n’abagore bahateraniye.
